BR.name: Mad Dog McCree™
BR.description: Somente um pistoleiro pode parar o arruaceiro Mad Dog… e esse é você, parceiro. Quando o cruel bandido Mad Dog McCree se enfurece com o bando de fugitivos que estão sendo procurados, ele deixa o rastro de morte. Mad Dog McCree e seu bando de assassinos cruel e maldoso têm andado pela cidade. Ele sequestrou o prefeito e a sua filha que foram levados para o seu esconderijo. O que esta cidade precisa é de um pistoleiro para controlar o perigo. Reviva a glória do faroeste com o jogo de arcade clássico do American Laser Games, Mad Dog McCree!

CA.name: Mad Dog McCree™
CA.description: Only one gunslinger can stop a Mad Dog gone wild...and that's you, partner. When the ruthless outlaw Mad Dog McCree goes on a rampage with a nasty pack of wanted fugitives, they leave death in their wake. Mad Dog McCree and his band of cutthroats have ridden into town, kidnapped the Mayor and his daughter, and taken them to his hideout. These hombres are mean and vicious. What this town needs is a gunslinger to spray a little lead in harm's way. Relive the gunpowder glory of the Wild West with American Laser Games Arcade Classic Mad Dog McCree!

MX.name: Mad Dog McCree™
MX.description: Solamente un pistolero puede detener a Mad Dog vuelto loco...y ese, es usted amigo. Cuando el implacable bandido va alborotado con su pandilla de fugitivos, dejan la muerte a su paso. Mad Dog McCree y su banda de asesinos han viajado a la ciudad, arrestado al Alcalde y su hija y los han llevado a su guarida. Estos hombres son malos y crueles. Lo que esta ciudad necesita es tener a un pistolero que rocíe un poco de plomo para evitar problemas. ¡Libera la pólvora de la gloria del Salvaje Oeste con la Arcada Clásica de American Laser Games de Mad Dog McCree!

When the ruthless outlaw Mad Dog McCree goes on a rampage with a nasty pack of wanted fugitives, they leave death in their wake. Mad Dog McCree and his band of cutthroats have ridden into town, kidnapped the Mayor and his daughter, and taken them to his hideout. These hombres are mean and vicious. What this town needs is a gunslinger to spray a little lead in harm's way. Relive the gunpowder glory of the Wild West with American Laser Games Arcade Classic Mad Dog McCree!
